content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 5:20am on monday august 31, 2009 while driving west on dillon road through broomfield colorado my wife and i noticed a large brightly lit object low to the ground. i was in my car headed to work and she was right behind in her car. for about 5 miles we take the same way to work and she turns off while i keep going another 14 miles to my job.

when i first saw this object it had just made a slow sweeping right turn to position itself directly over the road heading our direction. it was so bright i immediately knew it was no aircraft i have ever witnessed. 

as i looked i realized there were no wings on this flying object. it appeared to me to be just a large roundish mass but i could not make out any particular details with the bright light. i noticed some red lights and blue lights but was not certain of the position of the lights on the craft.

at 5:20am this time of year it was still quite dark outside and this round object was very brightly lit with an intense white light. the white light was so intense it drowned out the smaller lights on the sides and top of the craft.

i slowed down to take a look and rolled my window down. by this time it was about 2 or 3 blocks ahead of me coming directly towards us. 
this craft made no sound at all and i was expecting to hear an engine.  i would estimate the diameter of this round object 100-150 feet across as it was wider than the road and it could not have been more than 100 feet above the road. 

all of a sudden i lost interest, rolled up window and got back to the speed limit on the road. i had no thoughts of ufos or objects coming down the road at a low altitude. i looked in my mirror and saw my wife had slowed way down and i had gotten ahead of her several blocks. 

i wondered why she was so far behind so i slowed down to let her catch up. i continued to work and did not know about any ufo or having seen one.
my wife had waited and watched with her head out the window as this craft slowly moved over her car going the opposite direction at a low altitude and slow speed. 

she describes it as perfectly round with a domed top and several different lights on different parts of the craft. i had her draw a picture of this craft and the locations of the lights and she clearly remembers one red light on each the widest points of the craft and a blue light along the domed top on each side. 

after the craft passed over her she increased her speed to catch up to me. we did not see each other but she called me at work about 30 minutes later to tell me about the round ufo that passed over her car while she watched it outside the window. 

i told her it was a plane; we did not see a ufo. she repeated the size and shape and all of a sudden i remembered seeing it and i knew it was not an ordinary aircraft. 
aircraft can���t fly that slowly. aircraft can���t fly in silence as engines make noise when under power. 

aircraft have wings, this object had no wings. aircraft don���t usually fly down a road in the city low like this. too many things don���t add up for this to be any normal aircraft. and if our government has round domed top aircraft it���s new to me. not to mention completely being completely silent and able to defy gravity.

aircraft have stall speeds, (except helicopters) the speed at which the object will fall like a rock. i���m glad it did not fall like a rock with us under it. it certainly defied gravity whatever it was.

the strangest part of this to me is after seeing this object and knowing full well it was no aircraft that flies at such a slow speed and this close to the ground and with no noise at all that i just forgot about it. 
i can���t figure out why as soon as i was about 2 blocks from it and we were closing speed that my memory lapsed and i forgot about it until my wife called me at work and reminded me. 

at first i was very excited as i had not seen a ufo this close to the ground since about 1963 in washington dc.  but as i got closer to it my memory just disappeared and i completely forgot about it until 30 minutes later. had my wife not called and reminded me i may not have recalled it at all. 
another strange part of this is i take my camera with me all the time and it was laying on the seat next to me and the thought to take it out and get a photograph never entered my mind.
content.summary: Ufo flew along road directly over our cars about 100-125 feet high

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the ball park watching the hod rods when the fireworks display was starting.  that is when i first saw this.  it was like a small light.  i ignored it and then it caught my attention becoming closer and looking like a hot air balloon and then it became further and then turned into a light again.. i showed my grandfather and he too thought it was odd.
we left the game and on the way home we saw it again. it was a light, kind of amber orange, then it was near the moon and moved above it and then it changed into two strobing lights that blinked and moved rapidly in a strange pattern. it disappard once we went through some heavy trees and we did not see it again.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The ufo was at first a light then changed into balloon like w/ light then changed again into just a light disappearing and reappearing later

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of baloon  .I made approx. 4-6 pictures in 5 minutes and did not see anything strange. later when i was showing pictures to my friend i saw in one picture appears strange object .Everyone says its airplane or something else .But there was no airplane ,no bird ,no other baloons!
content.summary: Strange object shows above baloon.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of baloon  .I made approx. 4-6 pictures in 5 minutes and did not see anything strange. later when i was showing pictures to my friend i saw in one picture appears strange object .Everyone says its airplane or something else .But there was no airplane ,no bird ,no other baloons!
content.summary: Strange object shows above baloon.

content.detailedDescription:
Pre dawn on the 8th of july 2009, i checked the sky at 6.45am - gippsland, victoria, australia.
there were no clouds but there was a very light haze and a light breeze.
the sun was below my horizon and dawn was close.
i could easily see 1st magnitude stars and jupiter and venus were equally bright in the northern sky.
equidistant between them, almost as bright and the same colour, was what i initially assumed to be saturn on the ecliptic.
as i watched, ���saturn��� disappeared - like a light being switched off.
i checked afterwards with binoculars and there was no sign of anything in the vicinity.
what i saw wasn���t moving and there was no noise. there was no sign of aircraft navigation lights.
what i saw looked exactly like a planet i.E. not twinkling like a star.
the only satellite bright enough would have been the iss, but i checked and it was over russia at the time.
i checked my skymap software and there was nothing astronomical and bright enough in that position. saturn wasn���t currently visible in the australian sky.
 
i can���t see it being a weather balloon or a satellite because apart from it being stationary, it was high (about 60 degrees) in the sky and the sun was rising, not setting so it wouldn���t have blinked out. 
 
i���m well aware of the behavior satellites (normal and iridium), chinese lanterns, weather balloons and aircraft lights; i���m positive it wasn���t any of these.
 
this is not a spectacular sighting, but i���ve been an amateur astronomer for over 50 years and it���s got me stumped.
content.summary: Like something astronomical blinking off

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading south on the 101 freeway at approx. 10:20pm nearing highland blvd. exit... facing south on my way to cahuenga blvd exit...  through my windshield as i was driving, off to the right a little, i saw three bright lights that looked like starlight except they were gliding over hollywood heading east towards the hollywood sign and hills (moving to the left as i was viewing it).  i have seen video footage of triangle lights like this before, but never thought i would see one myself.   i almost thought i saw a reflection of the entire triangle's surface as it tumbled through the sky gracefully over the edge of the city...  it almost appeared as if it was 90% transparent but not fully.  none of the lights were ever obscured, but they did appear to be locked together and tumbling across the sky.   it was amazing.  i wondered if the other cars on the road were seeing it too.

i thought maybe these were helicopters but the lights were too bright and constant.   i've seen plenty of helicopters in la and i know the difference... and i know these things covered a good distance pretty quickly.   these things connected, glided and tumbled and made movements that are not what a helicopter is capable of or that three would ever do together...  these lights covered a few miles a minute and they appeared about 30 degrees above the horizon as i drove up the hill.   trees began to obscure my view...  once i got to my exit on cahuenga blvd... they were completely out of sight.

this looked genuine to me.
content.summary: Large triangle shaped formation of lights that appeared connected...

content.detailedDescription: I didn't even realize i had captured anything unusual on film the day this happened. i was at paine field in everett photographing some flybys of historic aircraft that are kept at the airfield there. i was going back through my photos yesterday when a cigar shaped object caught my eye in my images. i enlarged the images considerably to get a better look and i simply cannot explain them or their cigar-like appearance. the easiest explanation would be that its an aircraft at high altitude, but there are no contrails evident. in these two shots i was panning the camera to follow the aircraft as it flew parallel to the runway at paine field from south to north. i was viewing the aircraft while looking towards the west. both images were shot at 1/250th of a second using a canon 70-200 f4 "l" lens. the aperture was set to f13. the focal length was racked all the way out at 200mm. the type of camera used was a canon eos 50d. i took images in both .Jpg and canon raw format. i have no idea what i caught on my camera, but i have an open mind about these matters and wanted to share what i had with you folks to see if you could make heads or tails of it.
content.summary: Metallic cigar shape

content.detailedDescription:
I am a railroad engineer that went out to work on a work train to move a maintenance road gang in the summer of 2001.  we were called for 2:30am and made our way out of the yard within the hour.  around mile 28 on the wacouna subdivison, i noticed 2 triangular shaped objects in the sky at around 4:30 am.  the objects were identical in size and shape, and completely stood out from the few stars that could be seen at the time.

puzzled by these objects, i mentionned this to my colleague who was equally dumbfounded.  we actually stopped the locomotives in order to get a better grasp of what we were seeing.  he took out a pair of binoculars and we watch these objects hover above us.  the binoculars gave us a glowing perspective of the lights above us.  they seemed to be slowly moving while keeping the identical pattern.  we observed them for a few minutes, then decided to make our way north before the dispatch called us.

i wrote the whole episode off, until i saw an article in a french magazine a few months later.  my colleague agreed that the pics looked eerily quite similar to what we had seen.  then last week, i stumbled upon a discovery channel episode (28/08/09) concerning events in pensylvania that were quite similar to what we saw that morning.  i took it upon myself to relate to you this eye witness in the hope that it may correlate any other odd sightings.

we never witnessed anything like the sediment shower mentionned in the broadcast, but the shapes of the objects depicted in the programm matched what we saw that morning.  they seemed to be at a higher altitude, but  were easily dicernable from the few stars around.
content.summary: Triangular shaped lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
All ready did with pa mufon
this is a good friend of mine

very possible contact with experimation marks on skin

going to get medically examined to try to undersatnd what the marks are on the experiencer

possible sleep para involved

while examing marks ufo is spotted out the window hovering above tree the next night. ran outside and watch for 4 minutes. slowly hovering down behind a tree and they think landing in another yard.

experiencer said he thinks he just joined the club.


 i have photos of marks on body of experiencer
content.summary: Glowing red triangle white light on each point

content.detailedDescription:
During the tv documentary called " science and conspiracies ", the company emrtc was conducting a couple of experiments using high speed cameras and a cylinder crashing into a box.  the object is seen in the shot when the film is slowed down to properly see the results of the experiment. this documentary was sponsored by national goegraphic. the state director needs to get the film and have it analized.

emrtc is located in scorro new mexico...This is where the test were conducted.

the ufo footage is aproximately 90 minutes into the documentary.

i investigate ufo sightings for mufon in new jersey. my # is 11124.  ken pfeifer state section director.
content.summary: Dark disc appears in a couple of shots fron the tv documentary "science and conspiracies" aired today at 9 pm  eastern standard time.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my son were walking are dogs at around 9:50 pm we were turning a corner when my son looked up at the sky and pointed up and said "look what is that". i looked up and there was this cigar shaped thing flying upward at an angle. we sat there and watched it fly at an angle for no more than 30 seconds or less. it looked again like a cigar and had a very faint trail behind it that was traveling way faster than any earth made craft we have ever seen. it slowed down for like 1 second and then took off into the night where we lost view of it.
content.summary: A cigar shaped ufo flew quickly kinda at an angle upward

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on north on c.R. 100 east when i seen what appeared to be a sparkling star low on the horizon, but the longer i looked ,i realized that it was heading almost directly towards me.My friend called it out before i could because i didnt want to seem like i was an idiot.He broke the silence first and i am glad he did because he asked me to stop.After i stopped we both got out and looked about 45 degrees forward and up and it dissappeared,couldnt see it because of low cloud cover.Then the clouds lit up as if a plane was heading straight towards the ground but the clouds actually showed movement like someone was up in the cloud with one of those cheap spinning party lights.Whatever it was came out of the clouds for a split second just above us ,in a swooping type of flight path,tumbling end over end then it went right back out of sight in the clouds.It had no apparent shape that i could tell because the lights made it hard to see any detail on the object.The strangest thing ,outside of just seeing a friggin ufo ,is that there was no sound and i could actually feel a vibration or pulse in the atmosphere all around when it passed.We ,after having seen that are now absolutely without a doubt believers now.I havent had a good nights sleep since.
content.summary: Tumbling end over end with red,green, and blue lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in rural area southwest of town at a private pond fishing. we were standing on the bank facing east. the pond is about an acre and is surrounded by woods. there is open area around the pond and where the woods stop is a large opening looking back towards town. my fishing partner noticed it first and brought it my attention. from my right (south) i saw a huge pair of metalic cylinders with a tube joining them together. it didn't make any noise and i couldn't see any wings.The shape was unlike anything i have ever seen flying through the sky. the speed was slow for size of it and it flew a straight line path. appeared to slow down even more as it neared a us army military arsenal close to town. distance was approx. 2-3 miles, weather was partly cloudy & visibility was unlimited. we watched for nearly a minute and lost sight of it due to trees blocking view. wish i had caught it video!!
content.summary: Looked up to see a strange shaped object fly across sky

content.detailedDescription: At 9:45 i stepped outside to bring some stuff in, it was so crisp and clear i figured i'd check out the stars for a few mintues. (i own a telescope and have some experience with the night sky) i looked up and saw something flash, not thinking much of it because i had just turned my head to the sky.  i kept looking and saw what i figured was a satelite because it was just a single tiny pin point of yellowy orangish light which i could see slowly move from the south to n.E. i did not think this is what i saw flash until as i watched, it instantly pulsed to where it appeared bigger and brighter than saturn in the night sky only it was moving south to n.E. i kept watching and it did it again.  the pulses only lasted a split second. i began counting the seconds between pulses and it ended up to be 7 or 8 pulses, just about 8 seconds apart.  as it traveled to the n.E. it (the object not the flashes) got dimmer and disappeared from my view as it passed through cassiopeia.  i have seen a few satelites and the iss and shuttle passes.  this did not look like any of those.  i understand that the iss and shuttle will brighten up and fade away as they make their passes but pulsating like that is new to me.  i visited nasa.Gov and the tracking map did not show either being visible to me at that time, unless i read it wrong, which is possible.  but like i said, the pulsating is something i have never seen before. to pulsate from a dull pin point to such a large bright ball of light was very alarming.  airplanes pass by all the time, this was not an airplane.  this object was at such a high elevation-well, i shouldn't even say elevation; it was in orbit, it was clearly not an airplane.  i hope this helps!  i'd love to know if anyone else saw it.  it was awesome!
content.summary: Appearance of a sattelite but pulasting very bright light every 8 seconds or so

content.detailedDescription:
Avistamiento de un par de esferas sobrevolando la ciudad


a las 20 hs sobre salta capital, de sur a norte aparecieron dos luces en trayectoria recta, a una distancia de 200 metros, la principal tenia el doble de magnitud de la estrella mas fuerte visible en ese momento, y la secundaria que la segu���a en tenia 4 veces menos magnitud, atravesaron el firmamento a unos 500 kms hora aprox sin emitir sonido alguno.
esferas luminosas.

este no es el primer avistamiento que realizo.

saludos.
content.summary: Avistamiento de un par de esferas sobrevolando la ciudad (sighting of a pair of spheres overflying the city).

content.detailedDescription:
While out walking one night, i spotted four bright lights within a cloud.  the weather was clear, and it was a dark night.
the lights resembled the engines of a four-engine aircraft (similar to a c-54) all lined up and i had no idea what they were pointing at.
there was no noise at all, and after a while i noticed they began slowly moving toward the southeast, about five miles, then i lost them in the sky.
i estimate the cloud containing the lights was about a half-mile wide, the lights never moved in relation to one another, until the entire "thing" (cloud and lights) slowly moved to the southeast and disappeared. i estimate their altitude to be 1000 to 2000 feet, but it is really hard to estimate altitude with no reference points and no idea how big the "thing" was.
fyi: i used to be a mufon invetigator (1980), however this is the first time i have ever seen anything in the sky resembling a ufo.
content.summary: Very slow moving lights

content.detailedDescription:
My wife spotted this tonight as she traveled along i-40 between lebanon and gainesboro tennessee.

this object appeared low on the horizon and appeared to be stationary for 5-7 minutes approximately over carthage tennessee.

my wife couldn't discern any vertical or horizontal stabilizers, standard navigation lights or anything else that suggested it his was simply a blimp.

the cylinder appeared to be thinner and more elongated than the usual form of a blimp. and didn't appear to have come to a point on either end...

after traveling a short distance along i-40 (traveling east)and trying to keep it in sight, she lost sight of it as she went down a hill.....Once she emerged on the other side, the object was simply gone.

we are going to watch local news for other reports of this, and acknowledge that it simply could have been an unusual blimp or something, but the event was very unusual for central tennessee.
content.summary: Large dark cylindrical object with sequential falshing lights on underside.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving northbound on cross pointe blvd, between sr62 (morgan ave.) and sr66
(lloyd expressway).
the object didn't attract my attention at first, due to the location of the airport a few miles away. it was traveling south at an altitude of a few hundred feet... not unusual in the area.  the speed was about that of a small plane.
the thing that caught my attention was a flash of reflected light off a rather large flat area on the side of the nose.
i was convinced that it was a small plane, but i thought "what sort of plane has that flat spot?".  it was at that point that i noticed the lack of wings or horizontal tail surfaces.
it was a rather indistinct shape... long and dark, with a "segmented" appearance (the outline was not smooth, but looked as though it was  several parts married together into one vehicle). i did not see any evidence of a propeller, nor did i hear the sound of a jet.
by the time i realized what i had (i've hoped to see a ufo since a sighting i had as a child) and had turned eastbound to get a better look, it was gone.
i have lived near this airport for 51 years and am quite familiar with the aircraft that arrive and depart.  i do not recognize this one.
i am not making any claims of extraterrestrial origins, little gray guys or reptilians.  i am just reporting an unidentified flying object.
content.summary: Long,thin, irregular outline.  flat area on the side toward the front

content.detailedDescription:
Coming out of a local cvs store, i noticed several other people 
watching something in the sky. it was a bright white or silver light.
around this lite, and a good distance out from it, was a red, a blue and a green light spinning rapidly around it. every few seconds the 3 colored lights would go back into the original white/silver light. then the whole process would repeat. i have actually seen this several times dating back to 2004, and filed reports with cufon. there has been a local news story about a similar sighting on our local abc affiliate.
i am certain that this is not man made. during other times i have seen it i have seen it change places in the sky several times over the course of a night.
i have had people claim it is advertsing lights, satelittes and other things i am certain that it couldnt be.
during this saturdays sighting, the other people around all commented that it was unlike anything that should be in the sky.
i am more than willing to talk to a feild investigator about this and my past sightings. i have read and seen similar reports of this object in this area and others. i also heard a caller on coast to coast am call in from waynsboro ga and report a very similar sighting. that was back in 2004.
the sky was fairly clear here sat night, some clouds were visible. 
i noticed it because of the others around. i do not know any of the other witnesses.
my reaction was to contact georgia mufon about it this time, being about the 6th time ive seen it.
content.summary: White/silver light with a blue green and red light moving around it. stationary in sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling on number nine road ,in my car, outside of northern cambria at about one twenty a.M.  i noticed this exteremely bright light about 500 feet above and about 200 feet away from my vehicle.You couln't miss it; the light was almost oppressively bright. so, i stop, turn down the music and stick my head out of the window to try and hear some noise in case it was just a helicopter.  i didnt' hear anything.  the light it was emitting was steady, circular and bright.  a few seconds later it shot off over the horizon, it traveled so fast it looked like a shooting star.. the light trail it left was the longest i have ever seen and to my eyes it looked like it spand many many miles.  i caught my breathe because i was in shock and probably close to a stroke or heart attack at the point. i pulled back on the road and was a little scared because i had to travel the same direction i saw the "ufo" travel.
content.summary: Low flying, blinding, circle of light

content.detailedDescription: At 3:30 a.M. on august 31, 2009, i took my puppy outside in my back yard to go potty.  as i was walking in my yard i looked up in the western sky and saw a very bright light high and far away that i thought was a star.  i was going to make a wish and started to stare at it saying "star light, star bright, first star i see tonight" when i noticed it looked like it was changing colors.  i thought to myself, it wasn't a star afterall, it must be a plane.  i walked up to the top of the small hill in my back yrd to my fence line to try to get a better look.  i kept staring it to try to figure out for sure what it was and that's when i saw it move.  it moved around like a bee flying, in every which direction.  it was very strange. i had never seen anything move like that, so i kept watching it. it would move like that and then seemed to just hover.  the size of the light never changed and it never moved far from where i first saw it.  after a couple of minutes i noticed flickering or twinkling lights pop up around it and the big bright light would move quickly toward them.  i watched this go on for about 15 minutes.  i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me.  i have no explanation for what i saw.  it made me feel uneasy because i couldn't explain it.  it was bizarre and as i write this it soundsa crazy, but i know what i saw.  after about 15 minutes i went inside because my puppy was pestering and i was cold. it was very chilly outside.
content.summary: Bright light that seemed to change colors and moved quickly in all directions, like how a bee flies, towards several other "twinkling" lights near it.

content.detailedDescription:
This case referred to by rufos (roundtown ufo society)pete hartinger to connie mcnichols ssd/fi mufon

ssd/fi connie mcnichols talked with this witness via phone interview on 8/31/2009

witness stated that he is/was staying at a local campgrounds near lancaster and at about 7:00pm est that he was out doors cooking on the grill.He looked up and saw a shiny cylinder/bullet shaped object approximately 30'-50'long and tapered in the back.It was coming in and out moving along with a strange orangish/white cloud (the witness said that the cloud did not seem to be like the other clouds but like it was being made to conceal the object).About 4,000feet in altitude,45 degrees above horizon,moving slowly to the nw.The witness did not hear any sound as he contiued watching it.Duration approximately 20 seconds.
content.summary: Shiny cigar / bullet shaped object seen coming in and out of strange cloud

content.detailedDescription:
Let me start by saying that i am an "inactive" but certified field investigator for wisconsin mufon, so i have a fair knowledge of the difference between meteors, planes, or other conventional craft. during the aug. meteor shower my daughter and i went to a local park to watch the show. we saw several mereors despite the high level of city lighting it was about 45 min into our time viewing that we saw what i first believed to be the space station, however it moved to slowly and at times stopped moving across the sky. at this point i ignored the meteors and focused on the blinking object. it stayed in the southwest, aprox. hight of a small plane, but was easy to make out the triangle shape as it passed below areas of the sky when it finally began a slow direction to the northeast. it passed directly overhead and as the rear of the craft became visible 3 horizontal lights were quite visible, blinking in no notecibal pattern of blue, green, and and orangish-red we watched it continue northeast untill out of sight. using the "asprin test" from the mufon handbook and knowing that standard triangle craft are football field sized, i accertained this craft to be very high up. at this point i decided to leave the city to get a better view of the sky so we drove to the top of the bluff, high above the city lights. it was then we witnessed 3 more of the same objects, in the the southwest area moving in changing patterns,switching spots with one another and after about 10 min or so one craft again moved overhead from the sw to the ne untill out of sight. (this actually frightened my 14 year old daughter because she believed they were "watching" us). aprox 10-20 min after the first craft left sight the remaining 2 slowly left in oppisite directions, 1 to the east, 1 to the west. i took several pictures and video with my phone camera but the resolution was so poor nothing showed up upon review. i did not bring along a quality camera because i was expecting to only be viewing meteors, which are too fast and too unpredictibal to catch on camera unless your really lucky.
  feelings or reactions after the sightings? i was elated, bieng a devout ufologist, my daughter was at first amazed having never seen a ufo, but then became worried and now does not talk about it, trying to convince herself what she saw was a star or planet. (these objects were neither. stars do not move across the sky that rapidly and planets do not blink or twinkle. also, the only visible planets that night were jupiter and mars).
  that about sums it up, if more detail is needed you may reach me at the number provided. if no answer, please leave a message and i will return your call. i would also be intrested to know if you recieved any other reports of craft bieng spotted during the shower. anyone that went out to watch the shower should have seen them as they were not easily missed! thanks for your time, i hope wisconsin mufon has an active investigator available to review and prusue this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sighted 4 triangle shaped craft during aug. meteor event

content.detailedDescription:
It was monday afternoon. 
i went out into the garden to make some pictures with my digital camera of an approaching thunderstorm. i like to picture such events (i���m a hooby photographer). i made some pictures and later on the computer i watched these pictures and suddenly on one i saw a little white dot in the dark clouds. but it could have been anything, so i guessed. 
but on another picture there was it again, now closer on the left side of the picture. i was excited. as i zoomed it bigger it appeared to me to be something i never have seen before in that way. 
as i took the pictures i was looking north. but i haven���t seen anything with my eyes. only the clouds and the rain of the thunderstorm which was coming closer. weird... .
content.summary: Ufo seen near the village hausleiten, austria june 09

content.detailedDescription: There were 3 glowing amber orbs and one red flashing light on southern horizon of fairfield ca. the orbs were all seperated by a large distance and at all differnt altitudes but they were all close enough to eachother to be seen within the same glance. the large orbs looked like when a plane is flying at you with its main ligt pointed at you, how ever these lights were much brighter when they were fully illuminated. these lights would start off as dull lights then fade into being extermly bright amber colored orbs. the lights were all stationary and they would light up into view then fade back to nothing. they would not be visible for about 3-4 minutes then come into view for about 30-40 seconds at a time. they continued to do this for abotu one and a half hours. these orbs stayed in the same formation throughout the entire duration that i observed them. only one time did they change formation when they apperaed all together in a line at a 45 degree angel. also during the time of this sighting there was a constant flashing red light about 100-200 feet below these lights. this red light was small and weak and would flash on for 1 second then remain off for one second then continue to repeat that pattern.
content.summary: 3 amber orbs and glowing extremly bright to nothing and one red flashing light

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening in question i was at a friend's home watching a cricket match on tv. i went out to his large, grassy back year. i looked up at the overcast sky and saw a perfect triangular shaped hole in the clouds 1-200 metres above and around 50 metres ahead of me. the hole was slowly moving with the clouds in my general direction. the thought jokingly crossed my mind that this could be a hole for a ufo to enter through. within the space of 5 seconds after this thought a clock-wise spinning black triangular shaped object entered at a 45 degree angle from above the clouds near, but exactly through, the above mentioned hole in the clouds. it stopped just as it had made it below the clouds for a moment, then spun in reverse (anti-clockwise) and moved away retracing the  path it had arrived on. the sighting took a total of about 2-3 seconds. it was'nt until the object had stopped spinning that i could see it was a triangle, as while it was spinning down from above, it had resembled a boomerang in flight.

the event was over so quickly that i didnt have much time to respond emotionally or intellectually. i just observed it passively and was left somewhat bewildered as i had never heard of a triangular ufo. also, the fact that i had "thought" it first, seemed to suggest a psychological aspect to the sighting, which was further grounds for bafflement. however, suprisingly to myself, i didn't mention it to my friend when i reentered the house. in fact, i half forgot about for the rest of the evening, only pondering it further when i was later alone.
content.summary: Clockwise spinning dark triangular ufo approached through over cast skies at 45 degree angle from left to right 100-200 metres ahead and above me, stopped momentarily, then spinning anticlockwise moved away via the same path it had arrived, total 2-3 secs

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking my dog, i had only just walked maybe 100yds,1stly i heard a droning sound coming from somewhere, i maynot have noticed it if it wasn't for my dog max stood looking up in the air.As i looked up it was huge about the size of maybe 2 or 3 houses put together, bright illuminouse green in colour and it made a noise, it seemed to be hovering above my head and it seemed so low that i could reach out and touch it.But maybe that was an optical illussion as it was hard to say how low it was because of the illumination of it, i was 1stly filled full of awe,then as it started to move away, very slowly, then it just moved so fast it dissapeared ito the night i because petrified, i dragged my dog home and when't all around the house locking all my doors and windows. i have never been so afraid in all my life as i was that evening.
content.summary: Large object glowing bright green in colour

content.detailedDescription:
After the meeting at the tomali hut, i took a 5 megapixel picture of the moon (i guess it is the moon) which kept coming out from behind overcast sky.
later, on monday, i uploaded the picture to my computer.  but, to the left of the moon there appears an apparent object or perhaps partly illuminated cloud.  humorously, it appeared like a giant bug to me, but i did not see it when i took the picture.
the picture is appended.
was there a giant caterpiller watching your presentation?  i doubt it.
content.summary: Just image in sky

content.detailedDescription: At around 1am, me and my boyfriend went outside to go to the store and i noticed very blue spinning light high in the sky (slightly bigger than the size of a star).  i went back inside to grab my camera and took some pics.  i went to the store and came back 20 minutes later and it was still there.  after an hour of looking at it, i went inside.  i have no idea how long it had actually been there or when it left.
content.summary: Blue ufo spinning above house in yakima wa

content.detailedDescription: This is a true story, that became stranger when i learned of some things my father had been involved with. in 1995, my little brother and i were recounting our life as kids over a beer at college. he mentioned my fasination with spiderman as a kid, specifically when we lived in oh. i instantly recalled a strange thing that happened to me. i got excited and my little brother confirmed he remembered my story. i made him recount the story that i knew so well, but wanted to see if he recalled the reason why i was so in to "spiderman". i don't think i told anyone else of this story and i know he had not heard this story since he was 6 to 7 years old. winter/fall evening of 1978; dayton, oh; sugar creek area. my father a well respected naval intelligence insider and test pilot was working at the time on secret aviation things at a nearby afb, he has admitted only that he worked on things that required "reverse engineering". he is a technology and intelligence community insider. i am in the military currently, so names are not an option today. what happened was: i was playing on the floor near a second story window, i was 6yrs old. my little brother was in a half body cast from a broken leg. i noticed a small grey "balloon" hovering outside the window. everytime i looked at this shape, it went down below the window sill out of my sight. finally, i asked my little brother "do you see that balloon?". as i got him turned around to look, (he was not mobile, i had to shift him) "it" was gone. then, something went vertical past the window in a blurr. as i watched and stared, i got very scared, this "balloon", peaked in from over the window. it had eyes. it quickly retreated back upwards and i didn't see it again. i ran to the window yelling "spiderman, spiderman!" all i saw outside was the large oak-tree branch just outide the window. i recall it was getting dark/dusk. i am writing this story becasuse all of us should think about the unexpalined in our lives and try to make sense of it. my neighbor years later told me that they had seen lights in the corn field that was in my backyard that year. i believe i had seen something watching me, something in the tree, and it was not an owl, and it was not spiderman. i also believe that my father knows something about the ufo phenomenon because since 1995 i have been able to get him to talk about things, and he has reluctantly told me that he did meet the men in black during the time of my story. someday i will find out why he "can't answer" my questions...I'll be sure to share what i learn.
content.summary: Years ago i saw something in a tree outside my window
